name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
title: Yoimiya: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
in_play_description: After the Niwabi Enshou created by your Yoimiya, who has this card equipped, triggers: Deal 1 additional Pyro DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Yoimiya to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Yoimiya, equip this card. After Yoimiya equips this card, immediately use Niwabi Fire-Dance once. After the Niwabi Enshou created by your Yoimiya, who has this card equipped, triggers: Deal 1 additional Pyro DMG. (You must have Yoimiya in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
